Spilled!

Collect all the oil and upgrade your boat to explore new seas..

Features

A cup of coffee

A cup of coffee that has been spilled on the floor.

Upgrade your boat

Upgrade your boat to collect more oil, and go faster.

Explore new seas

You can explore new seas and collect new types of oil.
